Rinse suction catheter.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the suction catheter by gathering necessary supplies.
Rinse suction catheter.subject: The healthcare provider
Rinse suction catheter.tools: suction catheter, saline solution, sterile container

Rinse suction catheter.sentence: The healthcare provider fills the sterile container with saline solution to ensure proper rinsing.
Rinse suction catheter.subject: The healthcare provider

Rinse suction catheter.sentence: The healthcare provider inserts the suction catheter into the saline solution to rinse it effectively.
Rinse suction catheter.subject: The healthcare provider

Rinse suction catheter.sentence: The healthcare provider ensures that the suction catheter is thoroughly rinsed by moving it in the saline solution.
Rinse suction catheter.subject: The healthcare provider
Rinse suction catheter.object: the suction catheter is thoroughly rinsed

Rinse suction catheter.sentence: The healthcare provider removes the suction catheter from the saline solution and prepares it for use.
Rinse suction catheter.subject: The healthcare provider
